body: Map Devs - You may want to look at Mesoplanet - It will not Cycle off the server, so it is locking the server on the map. - Three servers are locked on it as of now.
body_tagged: Map Devs - You may want to look at Mesoplanet - It will not Cycle off the server, so it is locking the server on the map. - Three servers are locked on it as of now.
title: Mesoplanet wont cycle

replies.body: Thee Walls servers are currently locking at Mesoplanet in rotation with no players logged in to be more correct. ( as of 9:09pm est)
replies.body_tagged: Thee Walls servers are currently locking at Mesoplanet in rotation with no players logged in to be more correct. ( as of 9:09pm est)

replies.body: Sounds like the Campi Embrosi glitch.
replies.body_tagged: Sounds like the Campi Embrosi glitch.

replies.body: The countdown does not start. it lags everyone and then we get disconnected.
replies.body_tagged: The countdown does not start. it lags everyone and then we get disconnected.

replies.body: Cool, maybe the devs know how to fix it.
replies.body_tagged: Cool, maybe the devs know how to fix it.

replies.body: Why not post this in the GitHub?
